Tests unitaires¶

cd Python-OC-Lettings-FR/

source venv/b-in/activate

python manage.py test lettings.tests

python manage.py test profiles.tests

coverage run manage.py test lettings

coverage run manage.py test profiles

coverage report

coverage html
